# Load Packages

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

# making my stupid tables for my stupid girlfriend who i love very much 
```{r}
# making a df!
variable <- NA
estimate <- NA
standard_error <- NA
p_value <- NA

#make the df
model_1 <- data.frame(variable, estimate, standard_error, p_value)

#adding them 
model_1[1, ] <- list("Intercept", "-576.7051", "443.2350", "-")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("During", "799.1081", "162.1812", "<0.01")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("After", "298.9189", "162.1812", "0.07")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Employment Rate", "262.3563", "356.1806", "0.46")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Percent Male", "-2.2382", "3.7909", "0.56")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Total Population", "0.3682", "0.1038", "<0.01")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Housing Occupied", "-0.2460", "0.1659", "0.14")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Percent Young", "16.8799", "1.9930", "<0.01")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Percent White", "15.3984", "1.6278", "<0.01")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Total Labor Force", "-0.4667", "0.1293", "<0.01")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("Disadvantaged", "33.4071", "141.9843", "0.81")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("During x Disadvantaged", "-456.1872", "193.1305", "0.02")
model_1[nrow(model_1) + 1, ] <- list("After x Disadvantaged", "-293.5686", "193.1305", "0.13")

model_1 <- gt(model_1) %>% 
  tab_header(
    title = "Total Trip Origins Output"
  ) %>% 
  tab_options(
    footnotes.marks = "*"
  ) %>% 
  cols_label(
    variable = "",
    estimate = "Estimate",
    standard_error = "St. Error",
    p_value = "p-value"
  ) %>% 
  cols_align(
  align = c("right"),
  columns = everything()
) %>% 
   tab_footnote(
    footnote = "p < .05",
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(p_value), rows = c(12)))%>% 
   tab_footnote(
    footnote = "p < .01") %>% 
  tab_footnote(
    footnote = "p < .001",
    locations = cells_body(
      columns = c(p_value), rows = c(2,6,8,9,10)))
#.05 
#.01
#.001
  
model_1
```
